Source code for src.controllers.user_role

"""File to handle user role controller"""
from ..models import Models, create, delete, update

user_role = Models.UserRole



[docs]def get_all_user_roles() -> user_role.Model:
    """
    Get all user roles
    Returns:
        user_role.Model: user_role.Model
    """
    return user_role.Model.query.all()




[docs]def get_user_role_by_id(_id: int) -> user_role.Model:
    """
    Get user role by id
    Args:
        _id (int): id of user role
    Returns:
        user_role.Model: user_role.Model
    """
    return user_role.Model.query.get(_id)




[docs]def get_user_role_by_user_id(user_id: int) -> user_role.Model:
    """
    Get user role by user id
    Args:
        user_id (int): id of user
    Returns:
        user_role.Model: user_role.Model
    """
    return user_role.Model.query.filter_by(user_id=user_id).all()




[docs]def get_user_role_by_role_id(role_id: int) -> user_role.Model:
    """
    Get user role by role id
    Args:
        role_id (int): id of role
    Returns:
        user_role.Model: user_role.Model
    """
    return user_role.Model.query.filter_by(role_id=role_id).all()




[docs]async def post_user_role(data: dict) -> user_role.Model or None:
    """
    Post user role
    Args:
        data (dict): data to work with
    Returns:
        user_role.Model: user_role.Model
    """
    response, new_user_role = await create(data, "UserRole")
    if response:
        return new_user_role
    return None




[docs]async def update_user_role(_id: int, data: dict) -> user_role.Model or None:
    """
    Update user role
    Args:
        _id (int): id of user role
        data (dict): data to work with
    Returns:
        user_role.Model: user_role.Model
    """
    user_role_to_update = get_user_role_by_id(_id)
    if user_role_to_update:
        for key, value in data.items():
            setattr(user_role_to_update, key, value)
        response, updated_user_role = await update(user_role_to_update, "UserRole")
        if response:
            return updated_user_role
    return None




[docs]async def delete_user_role(_id: int) -> bool:
    """
    Delete user role
    Args:
        _id (int): id of user role
    Returns:
        bool: True or False
    """
    user_role_to_delete = get_user_role_by_id(_id)
    if user_role_to_delete:
        return await delete(user_role_to_delete, "UserRole")
    return False
